channel.title: TripPK
channel.description:
[center][size=6]Trip-PK 718 is RELEASED[/size] [size=6][size=5]No glitches, everything Added![/size][/size] * [size=6][size=5]Here I'll show you what I added and fixed in Trip-PK![/size][/size] * [size=6][size=5][Glitch Fixes][/size][/size] * [size=4]I successfully fixed Money Pouch Dupe.[/size] [size=4]I successfully fixed the chatbox and PM system.[/size] [size=4]I successfully fixed all Dupes.[/size] [size=4]I successfully fixed Prestiging System.[/size] [size=4]I successfully fixed Loyality System.[/size] [size=4]I successfully fixed Multilogging from the same IP.[/size] [size=4]I successfully fixed Clan Chat System.[/size] [size=4]Fixed IP Bans and IP Mutes.[/size] * [size=5][Working][/size] * [size=4]We're currently working on a Webclient.[/size] [size=4]We'll work in Auto-Voting System.[/size] [size=4]We'll work in Auto-Donation System.[/size] [size=4]We'll work on Duel Arena Minigame.[/size] [size=4]We'll work on Custom Yells.[/size] * [size=5][Completed Things][/size] * [size=4]Nex added, he drops Nex pieces, and is teamable boss.[/size] [size=4]You don't lose items if you die.[/size] [size=4]We successfully added Dicing in the server.[/size] [size=4]Added four modes, Very Easy, Medium, Hard and Extreme.[/size] [size=4]Added Real RS Graphics and Old RS Graphics.[/size] [size=4]Auto Retaliate System now successfully works![/size] [size=4]Added Giant Rock Crabs, you can AFK and train there.[/size] [size=4]Added an announcement when someone logins.[/size] [size=4]Added Dragon Claws Special Attack.[/size] [size=4]Added an "View Stats" option, where you can see other player stats.[/size] [size=4]Added ::hs command, where you save your stats in highscores.[/size] [size=4]Added Prestiging system. ::Prestige.[/size] [size=4]Added Vanguard, Trickster and Battle-Mage on Prestige Store.[/size] [size=4]Added Squeal of Fortune, where you can win Partyhats, Cash, Spirit Shield, Dragon Claws, etc.[/size] [size=4]Added three starter Packs, Mage, Melee and Mage.[/size] [size=4]Added Skill Points.[/size] [size=4]Added Staff Cape.[/size] [size=4]Added Veteran Cape.[/size] [size=4]Added some custom Emotes.[/size] [size=4]Added sounds on Different Places.[/size] [size=4]Added Clan Wars and Clan Wars Highscores.[/size] [size=4]Added Drygore weapons.[/size] [size=4]Increased damage. Harder Mode = More Damage.[/size] [size=4]Added 120 Dungeoneering.[/size] [size=4]Now you can't trade if you don't have a 400 Total Level.[/size] [size=4]Added Dominion Tower Minigame.[/size] [size=4]Added Zombie Onslaught Minigame.[/size] [size=4]Added The Crucible Minigame.[/size] [size=4]Added Achievement System.[/size] [size=4]Now you don't lose items if you're in Hard/Extreme Mode.[/size] [size=4]Now you don't lose items in Clan Wars PvP.[/size] [size=4]Added Queen Black Dragon.[/size] [size=4]Added Avatar of Destruction.[/size] [size=4]Added Glacors.[/size] [size=4]Added Basic Skilling Area and Advanced Skilling Area.[/size] [size=4]Added Dzone and Dzone Shop.[/size] [size=4]Added Green Donator Signs.[/size] [size=4]Added Revenants.[/size] [size=4]Added an Announcement when you get a skill 99.[/size] Added Player Titles. Added Blink Boss. Added Kalphite Queen Boss. Added Yk'Lagor the Thunderous Boss. Added Party Demon Boss. Added Hati's Relleka Woods Boss. Added Tormented Demons. * * * [b][size=6]AND MUCH MORE![/size][/b] * [size=5][font=verdana,geneva,sans-serif][b]Media[/b][/font][/size] *
[font=arial,helvetica,sans-serif][size=4]Starter Packs[/size][/font] [font=arial,helvetica,sans-serif][size=4][img]http://i.imgur.com/FUW3ina.png[/size][/font][/img] [font=arial,helvetica,sans-serif][size=4]Difficulties[/size][/font] [font=arial,helvetica,sans-serif][size=4][img]http://i.imgur.com/F5nVi7v.png[/size][/font][/img] More Options [img]http://i.imgur.com/RuDnUrJ.png][/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/DV4brks.png[/img] Account MAnager [img]http://i.imgur.com/0tm2JSD.png][/img] Account Info [img]http://i.imgur.com/82XCroZ.png][/img] Achievements [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZK2sWl0.png][/img] Achievement Rewards [img]http://i.imgur.com/LaTQzHf.png][/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DXZu61U.png][/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jHGSjsw.png][/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0wkTGRL.png][/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zdB5FV3.png][/img] Difficulty Information (higher damage also) [img]http://i.imgur.com/fF75pOx.png][/img] Squeal of Fortune (SoF) [img]http://i.imgur.com/XLo2D6y.png][/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ir4aWcU.png][/img] Announcement [img]http://i.imgur.com/Jizpjtl.png] Prestige Point Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/XNvbpsg.png][/img] PKP Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/j17t5Vb.png][/img] Skilling Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/EsYMcSM.png][/img] Manager Options [img]http://i.imgur.com/y4N939n.png][/img] Clan Chat working 100% [img]http://i.imgur.com/DMn7IhF.png][/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Kq11cx5.png][/img] Melee PK Gear (Has Mage & Range too) [img]http://i.imgur.com/Zq7BD2R.png][/img] Skillcape Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/2Ab4GUd.png][/img] Slayer Point Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/gArXsNW.png][/img] Food & Potions Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/3cnUQED.png][/img] Bones Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/bRWHeTH.png][/img] Dungeoneering Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/XINBxOt.png][/img] Loyality Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/Hs71Cbb.png][/img] Achievement and Rewards [img]http://i.imgur.com/0QSbvd6.png][/img] Prayer Switching. [img]http://i.imgur.com/T83DtpV.png][/img] Clan Wars PvP [img]http://i.imgur.com/NUKjXy6.png][/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1sUjjhk.png][/img] Training Teleports [img]http://i.imgur.com/c2OfgO5.png][/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JHaLjAD.png][/img] Auto-Retaliate Working. [img]http://i.imgur.com/FJ1cirV.gif][/img] Emotes
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pTRaOhN.gif][img]http://i.imgur.com/Fbzn7tL.gif][/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SdT0hle.gif][img]http://i.imgur.com/aDnOOzJ.gif][/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7gIdir6.gif][img]http://i.imgur.com/l7P7w7r.gif][/img] Dungeoneering. [img]http://i.imgur.com/ANeMxfH.png][/img] Min Graphics [img]http://i.imgur.com/eqD2RIS.png][/img] Low Graphics [img]http://i.imgur.com/UQ2IbAs.png][/img] Mid Graphics [img]http://i.imgur.com/mdFcTqL.png][/img] High Graphics [img]http://i.imgur.com/oxttQSs.png][/img] Custom Graphics Options [img]http://i.imgur.com/72mlrjT.png][/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/kPh7ju1.png][/img] * [size=6]Download the Client NOW![/size] [size=5]Cick [b][url=http://trip-pk.org/play/tp718.jar]HERE[/url][/b]*to download[/size] [size=5]Click [b][u][url=http://www.trip-pk.org/forums]HERE[/url][/u][/b] to visit Forums[/size] * [size=5]Enjoy our RSPS![/size][/center]

item.description:
@Duart_Ftw wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:5, topic:543068”]Unnecessarily large text, also you should really use the spoiler tags to hide all of the images in order to keep the advertisement clean and uncluttered.

We know, but we shared this code in other sites too, the sizes are different =/ =/.

Also, Bumping this thread~~ JOIN TRIP PK PLEASE

Read full topic

item.title: TripPK
item.dc:creator: @ganghackthg1 ganghackthg1
item.description:
@ganghackthg1 wrote:

[center][size=6]Trip-PK 718 is RELEASED[/size]
[size=6][size=5]No glitches, everything Added![/size][/size]
*
[size=6][size=5]Here I’ll show you what I added and fixed in Trip-PK![/size][/size]
*
[size=6][size=5][Glitch Fixes][/size][/size]
*
[size=4]I successfully fixed Money Pouch Dupe.[/size]
[size=4]I successfully fixed the chatbox and PM system.[/size]
[size=4]I successfully fixed all Dupes.[/size]
[size=4]I successfully fixed Prestiging System.[/size]
[size=4]I successfully fixed Loyality System.[/size]
[size=4]I successfully fixed Multilogging from the same IP.[/size]
[size=4]I successfully fixed Clan Chat System.[/size]
[size=4]Fixed IP Bans and IP Mutes.[/size]
*
[size=5][Working][/size]
*
[size=4]We’re currently working on a Webclient.[/size]
[size=4]We’ll work in Auto-Voting System.[/size]
[size=4]We’ll work in Auto-Donation System.[/size]
[size=4]We’ll work on Duel Arena Minigame.[/size]
[size=4]We’ll work on Custom Yells.[/size]
*
[size=5][Completed Things][/size]
*
[size=4]Nex added, he drops Nex pieces, and is teamable boss.[/size]
[size=4]You don’t lose items if you die.[/size]
[size=4]We successfully added Dicing in the server.[/size]
[size=4]Added four modes, Very Easy, Medium, Hard and Extreme.[/size]
[size=4]Added Real RS Graphics and Old RS Graphics.[/size]
[size=4]Auto Retaliate System now successfully works![/size]
[size=4]Added Giant Rock Crabs, you can AFK and train there.[/size]
[size=4]Added an announcement when someone logins.[/size]
[size=4]Added Dragon Claws Special Attack.[/size]
[size=4]Added an “View Stats” option, where you can see other player stats.[/size]
[size=4]Added ::hs command, where you save your stats in highscores.[/size]
[size=4]Added Prestiging system. ::Prestige.[/size]
[size=4]Added Vanguard, Trickster and Battle-Mage on Prestige Store.[/size]
[size=4]Added Squeal of Fortune, where you can win Partyhats, Cash, Spirit Shield, Dragon Claws, etc.[/size]
[size=4]Added three starter Packs, Mage, Melee and Mage.[/size]
[size=4]Added Skill Points.[/size]
[size=4]Added Staff Cape.[/size]
[size=4]Added Veteran Cape.[/size]
[size=4]Added some custom Emotes.[/size]
[size=4]Added sounds on Different Places.[/size]
[size=4]Added Clan Wars and Clan Wars Highscores.[/size]
[size=4]Added Drygore weapons.[/size]
[size=4]Increased damage. Harder Mode = More Damage.[/size]
[size=4]Added 120 Dungeoneering.[/size]
[size=4]Now you can’t trade if you don’t have a 400 Total Level.[/size]
[size=4]Added Dominion Tower Minigame.[/size]
[size=4]Added Zombie Onslaught Minigame.[/size]
[size=4]Added The Crucible Minigame.[/size]
[size=4]Added Achievement System.[/size]
[size=4]Now you don’t lose items if you’re in Hard/Extreme Mode.[/size]
[size=4]Now you don’t lose items in Clan Wars PvP.[/size]
[size=4]Added Queen Black Dragon.[/size]
[size=4]Added Avatar of Destruction.[/size]
[size=4]Added Glacors.[/size]
[size=4]Added Basic Skilling Area and Advanced Skilling Area.[/size]
[size=4]Added Dzone and Dzone Shop.[/size]
[size=4]Added Green Donator Signs.[/size]
[size=4]Added Revenants.[/size]
[size=4]Added an Announcement when you get a skill 99.[/size]
Added Player Titles.
Added Blink Boss.
Added Kalphite Queen Boss.
Added Yk’Lagor the Thunderous Boss.
Added Party Demon Boss.
Added Hati’s Relleka Woods Boss.
Added Tormented Demons.
*
*
*
[size=6]AND MUCH MORE![/size]
*
[size=5][font=verdana,geneva,sans-serif]Media[/font][/size]
*

[font=arial,helvetica,sans-serif][size=4]Starter Packs[/size][/font]
[font=arial,helvetica,sans-serif][size=4]
[font=arial,helvetica,sans-serif][size=4]Difficulties[/size][/font]
[font=arial,helvetica,sans-serif][size=4]
More Options

Account MAnager

Account Info

Achievements

Difficulty Information (higher damage also)

Squeal of Fortune (SoF)


Announcement

PKP Shop

Skilling Shop

Manager Options

Clan Chat working 100%


Melee PK Gear (Has Mage & Range too)

Skillcape Shop

Slayer Point Shop

Food & Potions Shop

Bones Shop

Dungeoneering Shop

Loyality Shop

Achievement and Rewards

Prayer Switching.

Clan Wars PvP


Training Teleports


Auto-Retaliate Working.

Emotes




Dungeoneering.

Min Graphics

Low Graphics

Mid Graphics

High Graphics

Custom Graphics Options


*
[size=6]Download the Client NOW![/size]
[size=5]Cick HERE*to download[/size]
[size=5]Click HERE to visit Forums[/size]
*
[size=5]Enjoy our RSPS![/size][/center]
